FULL_PATH: refractometer/channel/bandwidth/i_component
IDS: refractometer
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 3
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 4
PARENT_CONTAINER: refractometer/channel/bandwidth
FIELD_NAME: i_component
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: refractometer -> channel -> bandwidth -> i_component

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: I component of the IQ detector used to retrieve the phase of signal's envelope, sampled on a high resolution time_detector grid just before each measurement time slice represented by the ../time vector

CONTAINER[refractometer/channel]: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer

refractometer/channel/bandwidth/phase_qu.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: refractometer/channel/bandwidth/phase_quadrature
IDS: refractometer
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 3
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 4
PARENT_CONTAINER: refractometer/channel/bandwidth
FIELD_NAME: phase_quadrature
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: refractometer -> channel -> bandwidth -> phase_quadrature

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: In-phase and Quadrature components of the analysed signal. They are returned by an IQ-detector, that takes carrying and reference signals as the input and yields I and Q components. These are respectively stored as the first and the second index of the first dimension of the data child.

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[refractometer]: Density profile refractometer diagnostic
CONTAINER[refractometer/channel]: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Data

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===

CONTAINER[refractometer/channel]: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer
CONTAINER[refractometer/channel/bandwidth]: Set of frequency bandwidths
CONTAINER[refractometer/channel/bandwidth/phase_quadrature]: In-phase and Quadrature components of the analysed signal. These are respectively stored as the first and the second index of the first dimension of the data child.

refractometer/channel/n_e_profile_approx.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: refractometer/channel/n_e_profile_approximation
IDS: refractometer
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 2
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 3
PARENT_CONTAINER: refractometer/channel
FIELD_NAME: n_e_profile_approximation
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: refractometer -> channel -> n_e_profile_approximation

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Approximation of the radial electron density profile with an array of parameters and an approximation formula, used by post-processing programs for the identification of the electron density profile.

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[refractometer]: Density profile refractometer diagnostic
CONTAINER[refractometer/channel]: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer

=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: refractometer/channel/n_e_profile_approximation/formula
IDS: refractometer
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 3
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 4
PARENT_CONTAINER: refractometer/channel/n_e_profile_approximation
FIELD_NAME: formula
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: refractometer -> channel -> n_e_profile_approximation -> formula

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Analytical formula representing the electron density profile as a function of a radial coordinate and adjustable parameters f(rho_tor_norm, alpha1, ... alphaN)

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[refractometer]: Density profile refractometer diagnostic
CONTAINER[refractometer/channel]: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer
CONTAINER[refractometer/channel/n_e_profile_approximation]: Approximation of the radial electron density profile with an array of parameters and an approximation formula, used by post-processing programs for the identification of the electron density profile.

CONTAINER[refractometer/channel/n_e_profile_approximation]: Approximation of the radial electron density profile with an array of parameters and an approximation formula, used by post-processing programs for the identification of the electron density profile.
CONTAINER[refractometer/channel/n_e_profile_approximation/formula]: Analytical formula representing the electron density profile as a function of a radial coordinate and adjustable parameters f(rho_tor_norm, alpha1, ... alphaN)

ROOT_IDS[refractometer]: Density profile refractometer diagnostic

CONTAINER[refractometer/channel/n_e_profile_approximation]: Approximation of the radial electron density profile with an array of parameters and an approximation formula, used by post-processing programs for the identification of the electron density profile.
CONTAINER[refractometer/channel/n_e_profile_approximation/formula]: Analytical formula representing the electron density profile as a function of a radial coordinate and adjustable parameters f(rho_tor_norm, alpha1, ... alphaN)
